summary: REQ-1/2/3 appear to be implemented via a new PreLoginExperience page, auth-based gating in App.tsx, header behavior changes, and GamesHub trial/locked behavior. However, the diff summary also indicates multiple substantial, unrelated feature additions/changes (CSS redesign, query hook overhauls, game logic changes, new game layout/upgrades, events notifications, video generator changes), which violate the “focused changes only / do not introduce unrelated features” constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Global UI/CSS redesign (new OKLCH color system, backgrounds, neon effects, 3D avatar styling).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest is only about login/trial gating and explicitly asks for focused changes only.

hallucinated_features.description: Major expansion/changes to React Query hooks and localStorage-based implementations for many modules (art gallery, certificates, craft projects, events, jokes, music remixes, stickers, spin wheel, seasonal events, invention stories), plus polling and various type-conversion behaviors.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goal is to avoid changing data model/CRUD/module functionality beyond access gating.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified reusable GameLayout with trophy/pet upgrade functionality and upgrade dialogs.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; introduces new gameplay/meta systems beyond gating.

hallucinated_features.description: Significant rework/optimization of BalloonPop game (spawning, scoring rules, animation loop, performance refactor).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goal explicitly says not to modify game logic/content.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed gameplay features in multiple games (MemoryMatch progressive difficulty, WordWizard/NumberRunner detailed mechanics).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goal explicitly says not to modify game logic/content.

hallucinated_features.description: Events page changes: automatic event-day notification system and localStorage-based event management without backend calls.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; alters module behavior beyond gating.

hallucinated_features.description: Video Generator page: fully functional Generate button with canvas-based 2D animated video previews.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; introduces/changes module functionality beyond gating.
